attributes.action: Government to give significant payrise to all NHS staff on the frontline
attributes.additional_details:
Politicians have been quick to give praise for the exemplary work of the NHS at the time of this crisis with clapping during the first wave of the Virus. Yet that has done nothing for all NHS staff who are in the midst of the second wave with more cases, more deaths and  more colleagues going of sick. 

If the government want to show real support to NHS provide more funding and wage increases for all.
attributes.background: Provide more support to NHS staff and frontline workers through this COVID pandemic who have been working long shifts, who are mentally tired and exhausted, who have lost colleagues to COVID and have families of their own.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Increase pay for all NHS staff by 15%: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565151

We should increase the pay of our NHS staff by 25%: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/563356
